answer: A Temporary Flight Restriction (TFR) is a type of Notice to Airmen (NOTAM) which defines an area restricted to air travel due to a hazardous condition, a special event, or a general warning for airspace. The text of the actual TFR contains the fine points of the restriction. Officially, information on TFRs can be found on https://tfr.faa.gov/ or through Flight Service at 1-800-wxbrief.
